name: zenstruck/form-bundle
description: Provides Twitter Bootstrap form theme, a help type extension, Ajax/Tunnel/Select2 entity form types and javascript helpers

suggest.cocur/slugify: CocurSlugifyBundle is required for the grouped form feature
suggest.zenstruck/slugify-bundle: If not using CocurSlugifyBundle, then this is required for the grouped form feature
suggest.zendframework/zend-crypt: Required when using the ajax entity type 'use_controller' option. Version: ~2.0,!=2.1.1
